Question: Temperature range
Help Text: Minimum, maximum and average yearly temperature

Question: Rainfall range
Help Text: Minimum, maximum and average monthly rainfall

Question: Other climatic relevant information
Help Text: Months with characteristic phenomena. Ex.: extreme temperatures, rainfall, drought, monsoon, etc.

Question: Geographical characteristics
Help Text: Coastal area, mainland, near or on a mountain, near or on a river, near or on an tectonic fault line, etc.

Question: Urban area
Help Text: Area within the boundaries where your local government has jurisdiction. Ex.: municipality area in km2

Question: Metropolitan area
Help Text: Area of influence in terms of economy and labour market, in km2

Question: Sublocal divisions
Help Text: Relevant administrative subdivisions. Ex.: districts, neighbourhoods, etc.

Question: Representative plan or map of your city
Help Text: Please provide link(s) to a masterplan or map of your city including the boundaries of your local government

Question: Representative view of your city
Help Text: Please provide link(s) to an orthophoto and/or aerial view of your city
